subproject.corporate outcome: Increased capacity of relevant government bodies and national capacities for  disaster management, risk reduction and mine action through common analysis, dialogue and coordinated activities among government, relevant civil society actors and other partners (i.e. UN, other international organisations, bilateral partners). And regional skills and capacities for conflcit prevention and peacebuilding negotiations strengthened.
subproject.description: The overall project goal is to mainstream Crisis Prevention and Disaster Risk Reduction within the development planning in Egypt. The specific goal is to strengthen the capacity of Egypt to address and deal with Crisis and Disaster in order to reduce the unacceptable risks, improve response and recovery systems and protect the country's development plan process and the well-being of the people in Egypt by reducing the loss of life, property damage and social and economic disruption caused by different types of disasters.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Capacity Building for Crisis,
